body:
This last messages was obviously not for the general public. I promise I'll dedicate some of my free time - which I'll have plenty of in the near future - to the study of the secrets of my e-mail client. ... and Radiance, of course.
;) Thomas ___ Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2008-September/005372.html).
